title: Ticket #2982: RFE: Data on Collector queries
description:
The condor_collector's primary task is receiving ads and servicing queries against those ads.

Data is needed to explore what queries are run and their behavior.

To that end, proposal is to add a dprintf to report query information. This information will be in an undefined format (don't rely on it being stable).

For instance, 

Query info: matched=5; skipped=3; query_time=0.001162; send_time=0.001652; type=Any; requirements={( ( ( MyType == "Scheduler" ) || ( MyType == "Submitter" ) ) || ( ( MyType == "Machine" ) ) )}; peer=<127.0.0.1:46378>; projection={}

Query info: matched=4; skipped=0; query_time=0.001492; send_time=0.000630; type=MachinePrivate; requirements={true}; peer=<127.0.0.1:47873>; projection={}

Query info: matched=1; skipped=0; query_time=0.000998; send_time=0.000457; type=Scheduler; requirements={( ( Name == "matt@eeyore.local" ) )}; peer=<127.0.0.1:46296>; projection={}

Query info: matched=4; skipped=0; query_time=0.000912; send_time=0.003644; type=Machine; requirements={true}; peer=<127.0.0.1:38013>; projection={Name Machine Opsys Arch State Activity LoadAvg Memory ActvtyTime MyCurrentTime EnteredCurrentActivity}
